headline: Should You Invest in Host Hotels & Resorts (HST)?
summary: Baron Funds, an investment management company, released its “Baron Real Estate Income Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund decreased 0.23% (Institutional Shares) in the quarter compared to a 1.46% decline for the MSCI US REIT Index (the REIT Index). Since its inception on December 29, […]
